kIcon_001.description: So <cl>much</c> to do, so little time!
kIcon_001.title: Slash

kIcon_002.description: There are three things Grumpy does not like. <cg>Everything</c>, <cy>everyone</c> and <cl>You</c>!
kIcon_002.title: Grumpy

kIcon_003.description: Looks <cl>Tiny</c> and <cy>peaceful</c>... but can you be sure?
kIcon_003.title: Pinkie

kIcon_005.description: <cl>Sleepy</c> and <cy>sceptical</c>, seems to be a good description.
kIcon_005.title: Luigi

kIcon_012.description: Ever since that <cy>Energy Drink</c>, <cl>BamBam</c> has never been the same...
kIcon_012.title: BamBam 2

kIcon_013.description: Currently testing the new <cl>Never Melt</c> Ice <cy>X3000</c>.
kIcon_013.title: Mr. Frost

kIcon_014.description: The <cl>saddest</c> Boom in Boomlia. Ever since the shop ran out of <cg>cookies</c>.
kIcon_014.title: Ome

kIcon_015.description: Always up to <cy>no good</c>. Keep an eye open when <cr>The Imp</c> is near...
kIcon_015.title: The Imp

kIcon_017.description: There are times when <cy>exploding</c> is not the right thing to do...
kIcon_017.title: PeaceBoom

kIcon_018.description: Some say that <cl>these</c> are the remains of the <cg>first</c> Boomling. It could also be a <cy>strange</c> rock...
kIcon_018.title: StoneBoom

kIcon_019.description: So <cl>cool</c>, it does not need a description.
kIcon_019.title: Cyboom X1

kIcon_020.description: More <cg>powerful</c> than any other Z-model. Batteries not included.
kIcon_020.title: Cyboom Z5

kIcon_022.description: It's <cg>green</c>... I mean, what more could you possibly want?
kIcon_022.title: Cyboom Y7

kIcon_023.description: Not the <cy>smartest</c> of the <cg>Borcs</c>, not even close...
kIcon_023.title: JubJub

kIcon_024.description: Determined to start the first <cy>Boomling</c> <cg>Jungle Tribe</c>. It's not going very well.
kIcon_024.title: JibJib

kIcon_025.description: You cannot hide from the <cr>Boom Hunter</c>... Seriously, <cy>stop</c> hiding.
kIcon_025.title: Boom Hunter

kIcon_026.description: A fierce <cl>rebel</c> with a craving for <cy>Street Fights</c>.
kIcon_026.title: Boom Kid

kIcon_027.description: <cg>Protector</c> of the innocent and <cr>scourge</c> of the wicked! And what a <cl>Mustache</c>!
kIcon_027.title: Borro

kIcon_029.description: The <cy>richest</c> of all the Boomlings. Which he reminds everyone <cg>every</c> 5 minutes.
kIcon_029.title: The Baron

kIcon_030.description: There are no seas in <cl>Boomlia</c>. Maybe that's why he's so <cr>angry</c>?
kIcon_030.title: Pirate Boom

kIcon_032.description: There is no <cy>challenge</c> to great for <cl>Captain Flash</c>!
kIcon_032.title: Captain Flash

kIcon_033.description: The <cr>Ghost</c> of Boomlia. <cg>Master</c> of his own fate, and <cy>champion</c> of the Gods.
kIcon_033.title: Boomos

kIcon_034.description: If he goes anywhere, don't worry. <cg>He will be back</c>.
kIcon_034.title: Boominator

kIcon_035.description: <cr>Jetpacks</c> and <cg>Boomlings</c> are a combination few have tried... And <cy>none</c> have mastered.
kIcon_035.title: JetBoom

kIcon_036.description: Infused with a <cg>mystic power</c>. The <cy>Blobbos</c> are the source of all color in <cl>Boomlia</c>.
kIcon_036.title: Blobbo

kIcon_037.description: An <cy>anchient warrior</c> blessed with the <cg>power</c> of the <cl>MegaBlobbos</c>!
kIcon_037.title: DragonBoom

kIcon_038.description: A true force of <cr>Evil</c>. Beware of<cy>Skulletor</c>...
kIcon_038.title: Skulletor

kIcon_039.description: No one knows what they have <cg>eaten</c>... But it could <cr>not</c> have been <cl>tasty</c>!
kIcon_039.title: Mega Blobbo

kIcon_040.description: Some Boomlings are just happy. Period.
kIcon_040.title: Clueless

kIcon_041.description: <cg>The Colorless</c> were banished from <cl>Boomlia</c> thousands of years ago. They long for <cr>revenge</c>!
kIcon_041.title: Enraged Boom

kIcon_042.description: The leader of the <cg>Colorless Tribe</c>... This is one seriously <cr>angry</c> Boom.
kIcon_042.title: BOOOOM UUUUUU

kIcon_043.description: <cy>Years</c> have passed since the <cl>masked</c> Boom was last seen. Where did he go?
kIcon_043.title: Master of Disguise

kIcon_044.description: No one knows where the large group of <cy>BoomChu's</c> came from. But it has been hard trying to <cg>catch</c> them all.
kIcon_044.title: BoomChu

kIcon_045.description: All bow down to <cy>SkeleBoom</c>! Basically he is <cr>evil</c>. Yea...
kIcon_045.title: SkeleBoom

kIcon_046.description: Search the <cg>Deepest Swamp</c> in <cl>Boomlia</c> to find the Swamp Boom... and maybe his <cy>Donkey</c>.
kIcon_046.title: Swamp Boom

kIcon_047.description: <cr>Booming</c>.. Is the <cl>only</c> thing I was good at...
kIcon_047.title: Boom Fox

kIcon_048.description: There is no <cg>racetrack</c> in the world to difficult for <cl>The Boom Racer</c>. If only he had a <cy>car</c>...
kIcon_048.title: Boom Racer

kIcon_049.description: Master <cy>tactician</c> and Boom <cg>expert</c>. Can also be sneaky... very <cl>sneaky</c>.
kIcon_049.title: Solid Boom

kIcon_051.description: A <cl>Mentally</c> unstable <cg>Boom veteran</c>. <cy>Skilled</c> with every <cr>weapon</c> known in Boomlia.
kIcon_051.title: RamBoom

kIcon_052.description: Six <cg>different Blobs</c> accidentally tried to <cy>recolor</c> the same Boom. This is the <cl>result</c>.
kIcon_052.title: The RainBoom

kIcon_053.description: I give you <cy>Gold</c>,<cg>Y U NO</c> BUY <cr>POWERUPS</c>?!
kIcon_053.title: BoomUNo

kIcon_056.description: Scanning for <cr>Bombs</c>... ,<cy>No Bombs found.</c> ,Scanning for <cl>Noobs</c>... o_o
kIcon_056.title: BoomBot

kIcon_057.description: The Kings <cr>evil</c> brother. Secretly <cg>allied</c> with the Colorless to overthrow the king! <cy>Be Prepared</c>!
kIcon_057.title: Royal Boom

kIcon_058.description: Roses are <cr>Red</c>,Violets are <cl>Blue</c>,I am the <cg>King</c>,<cy>BOW DOWN TO ME</c>!
kIcon_058.title: The BoomKing

kIcon_059.description: The <cy>Champion Knight</c> of <cl>Boomlia</c>. I put the <cg>Boom</c> in Boomlings!
kIcon_059.title: Boom Crasher

kIcon_063.description: A <cl>Boomling</c> created from solid <cy>Gold</c>. The shine is so bright!
kIcon_063.title: Golden Boom

kIcon_064.description: I will make a <cg>special</c> treat for <cy>you</c>!
kIcon_064.title: Boom Chef

kIcon_065.description: <cl>Boomlia</c> needs a <cy>hero</c>, and that hero is <cg>The Boon</c>...
kIcon_065.title: The Boon

kIcon_066.description: This is just a <cg>strange</c> hybrid. Seems to like <cy>carrots</c>.
kIcon_066.title: BunnyBoom
